page.title: 17TRADE IN NW NEWBURY & SPEEN
page.content: {LOCAL SHOPPING FACILITIES}Some small self-service stores + a general store, newsagents,pet shop & 2 unisex hair salons in{urban}area.In {rural}area few facilities apart from a village shop & sub post office/store at Donnington village.Shortage of butcher/greengrocer shops & post offices noted. {MILK DELIVERIES}Daily except Sundays in urban area;every other day in country.Most self-service stores sell fresh refrigerated milk in bottles or cartons. {HIGHER TIER SHOPPING}Newbury main shopping centre with bi-weekly open air market. D.I.Y.multiples open inclusive of weekends.Greater family mobility & inceasing use of household deep-freezes results in fortnightly/ monthly shopping.Stores at Reading, Swindon give greater choice of shops.
